item.description: 前财政部长拉里-萨默斯（Larry Summers）表示，美联储上个月的降息决定是一个错误，因为新数据显示美国上个月的就业增长超过了所有预期。【原文：Former Treasury Secretary Larry Summers said the Federal Reserve’s decision to cut interest rates last month was a mistake after new data showed that US job growth last month topped all estimates.】

item.title: 摩根大通和美国银行不再认为美联储会在 11 月降息半点
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）和美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）目前预测，美联储将在11月举行下次会议时将利率下调四分之一个点，在劳动力市场数据提供了美国经济韧性的证据之后，他们放弃了更大幅度降息的呼吁。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Bank of America Corp. are now forecasting a quarter-point reduction in interest rates when the Federal Reserve next meets in November, giving up on their calls for a larger cut after labor-market data offered evidence of US economic resilience.】
